item.description:
As we get into the heart of winter, let’s do something different and fun where we can still get exercise. Dance Freedom is one of the most unique dancing places that I have been to. The dance floor has creative lighting with creative music that isn’t too loud so we can dance and also have a conversation.

Here is a link to learn more about Dance Freedom: www.dancefreedom.com. There is a sliding scale admission fee of $8 - $12.

We might not be walking through nature preserves, climbing hills or exploring neighborhoods but we will be getting exercise and if you have never been before (or even if you have) it is a true adventure!
item.name: Winter Exercise and Fun: Dance Freedom!
